review: I use Apple TV to watch Netflix, mirroring from IPhone, IPad, Mac by connecting to my Home Wifi. I also have a Office WiFi at Home ( via virtual office) which uses 801.1x authentication ( ie it asks for username and password).I bought this so that I can connect it to the family TV and stream for work purpose ( like Web basedTraining, Web Conference etc while relaxing on my sofa. For this I need to connect this to my office Wifi. It doesn't work at all.So, I am left with my Home Wifi. However, the problem is , if I want to stream from my laptop ( i don't see why i should use this with my iphone as I already have the apple TV), it needs Google Chrome OS. There are two issues here.1) If you have a Firewall,you have to allow it or disable it. In my case, my PC firewall is managed by my Office IT. So,I cannot  edit the FW to allow Google Chrome application and hence a problem.2) I  disable the FW on my laptop (which is not safe) and was able to connect it but the connection drops all the time.Further, if you are using this to steam from your phone, there seems to be limited app. So, if you want to watch stuff like PBS app or something , it might not work.In my opinion, this is way behind the Apple TV.  It's worth spending at least 100 bucks on Apple TV  than to break your head on this. I got this today and already requested for a Return. Not worth it.
